description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). The arcade classic is back! Re-live the excitement of Tron â€“ race life cycles, demolish tanks, dodge grid bugs and even square off against the MCP himself! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
description.short: Enter the computer world of Tron in this arcade classic. Brave the dangers of the game grid as you race Light Cycles, fend off deadly Grid Bugs, navigate the Tank Maze, and attempt to break through to the MCP Cone. Unlock the full version to gain access to the full game, multiplayer modes, and the ability to compare scores on the leaderboards!
